(North Ghy - Due to incessant rain, localities of village Amingaon namely Kalibari and Madhyam are facing rain water logging
issues. Field inspection with the concerned line departments have been carried out for taking temporary measures.)

(Guwahati - Due to rain waterlogging took place on Chandmari, Bamunimaidam, Anuradha, Nepali Chowk and Maligaon.
